Opening a Folder's External Definitions

To open an editor for a folder's external definitions:

  1. Select a folder in a source list or browser view.
  2. Select File > Open Externals for … (key equivalent ⇧⌘X) or click the Externals button in the application's toolbar:

  3. An externals editor will be opened for the selected folder. If an editor was already open for the folder then that editor is brought into the foreground and re-activated.

An empty document is displayed in the editor if the selected folder doesn't have an svn:externals property.
